name: paxha/laravel-fcm
description: This package, Laravel FCM (Firebase Cloud Messaging), is designed to facilitate the sending of notifications using the Firebase Cloud Messaging HTTP v1 API. It provides a simple and efficient way to handle FCM notifications within a Laravel application. With this package, developers can easily integrate FCM notifications into their Laravel projects, allowing for real-time updates and communication with users. The package leverages the power of Firebase's robust cloud messaging service, making it easier to send targeted notifications to different user segments.
